description: Q.U.I.R.K. is a multiplayer, cross-platform game for PC, macOS, and HTC Vive! Play Sportsball, our new fast-paced game-type, and build with an expanded collection of colorful blocks and props that will have your players bouncing higher, running faster, and having more fun than ever!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: For PC: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti (2 GB), AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB ), or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Network: Broadband Internet connection
